title: Best location Time Square and access
text: Great location , rooms are large with all amenities, John at reception is so friendly and helping , Manager was also helped me for some issue , all perfect about this hotel , from JFk to this hotel , it’s very easy and economical to reach , sure for stay here again , no restaurant inthe hotel but there is a Bar on roof top.

title: NO REFUND! BE CAREFUL!
text: I canceled the booking, through @booking.com, on the 26th Feb 24. I have contacted both the hotel (by mail and twice by phone) and booking.com and still awaiting refund. They told me they would made the refund department contact me, but no contact yet.

title: NO REFUND EVEN THOUGH CANCELED BOOKING FREE OF CHARGE!!
text:
I booked the hotel through booking.com from 23 May to 27 May but I was charged a recurrent payment of $1519.30 CAD on 31st March. I don’t understand why a single trip was charged as a recurring payment!?

Still waiting for a refund and nothing!!

title: Simply awful
text:
The hotel is awful. The rooms are dirty and old, furnitures broken, walls stained. Pictures on website do not match with real rooms. When we arrived One blanket had a blood stain. They gave us only 2 towels for a family of 4 people. Staff Is rude. On top of that they charged our credit card twice for the room and we wasted a lot of time to get confirmation that they will reimburse us. The hotel shares the entrance with a terrace bar, there's no control on people accessing the hotel floors.
Stay away from this Place!

title: Do not expect refund quickly
text: Do not book this hotel if you think you may need to cancel the booking . I booked this hotel 5th Jan 24  through @booking.com for a5day stay for Nov 24 money taken straight away I cancelled booking straight away as wasn’t sure of my dates to travel and wanted a hotel I could pay for on arrival . I expected my refund to be made straight away it is now 2nd April 24 and still no refund of €2000 . I have contacted both the hotel and booking.com and still awaiting refund .

title: Mostly good… but be aware of a couple of things
text:
The good:  great location.  Friendly staff.  Good size of room.  Really clean.  Bed comfy. No extra charges after paying on booking.com 

Be aware :  no usb charging points in room.  If you like up to the minute decor, maybe don’t stay here as the room was a little ‘worn’… it didn’t affect my stay, but others may mind more.  The room doesn’t have a lot of natural light, but does have a good range of lamps to give atmosphere.  

The less good: when I arrived, I was given my room number and went to the room only to find it was already occupied.  I came back to reception and was given a different room.  I imagine this sort of thing happens, but when I came back, I couldn’t get in my new room as apparently a note hadn’t been made the evening before.  Not a huge deal and handled well by the staff, but when you’re tired these things can irk! 

The hot water wasn’t working on my final morning.  Apparently the whole building was affected - a cold shower was invigorating, but not ideal ! 

The deadlock on my door was broken - someone came to try and fix it but it would have needed a whole new door handle.  As a woman travelling along, this was a concern.  I didn’t feel unsafe at any point, but the offer of an alternative room with a working deadlock would have been appreciated.  

On the whole though, this was a comfortable hotel and a reasonable price for the location and room size.

title: To forget
text: A real disaster: when we arrived we found a dirty room. Papers were lying on the floor, a bracelet had been forgotten on the bedside table, the walls, although white in the Booking photos, were covered with black marks. We passed a cloth and it came out...BLACK. The hotel only gave us one soap in the room, just a little for cleaning our hands and showering! We had to beg for another one. There were no cups available. The TV never worked. As for the elevator, it broke down (so we had to carry the suitcases up several floors). The staff is unpleasant and does not care about the customers (it must be said that there is such a flow of customers, why make any effort). Value for money is far from it: more than 100 euros per night to have just two beds and a shower, without breakfast and in the dirt... In a word, avoid!

title: Friendliness and good location
text:
Everyone on the staff was very friendly, but especially Lila at the reception who gave me a warm welcome. The cleaning girls are very respectful. The hotel is in a great location, it is very safe, there are no disturbing sounds.
They solved what I needed. Highly recommended!!!

title: Easy to find from Penn Station
text: The place is easy to find from the Penn Station.  As soon as we enter the hotel lobby, we were pleasantly surprised to find it warm and welcoming.  The room has a decent size with a good mattress.  The bathroom has everything you need.  One of its draw is how close it is to Macy”s, Time Square and Empire State Building.

title: Absolutely untrustworthy!!! Warning - do not book!!!
text: Why didn't I read the reviews sooner!!???? I booked the hotel at the beginning of February through booking.com. However, I had to cancel it again. Since February 5, 2024, I have been waiting for a refund of the booking amount of over US$3,500!!!! So I can only advise you not to book this hotel!!!!

title: Alexander
text: Very good location of the hotel, the price was super good for the location it has, they are affordable accommodation in the middle of the middle I stayed one night on business in NY. The hotel is very easy to get to and from by metro station 34St. The reception is easy to locate on the first floor. Lila attended me very formally when I entered, she gave me directions to find food nearby and breakfast and everything was great.

title: Stay away from this hotel
text: This hotel is not worth your money. My recommendation would be to spend the extra money to stay at the Hilton next door or any other hotel in New York. The location of the hotel is fantastic but that is the only positive comment I have. My experience from the first day was extremely poor. The poor customer service, rude front desk agents, red stain on the bed sheets that the front desk told me I would have to sleep on until the laundry was delivered the next day, sharp metal pieces sticking out from under the bed, barely functional tv, outdated and run down decor in the room, loud club music playing until 2 am on the weekends was all extremely disappointing and will deter me from staying at any more Wyndham hotels in the future.

title: Kind attention
text: We were very kindly attended to by Lila and José, they let us check in before 3 PM and they recommended many activities to do in NY, including a map and places to go to eat and drink, you can always ask them for something and They are ready to receive you in the best way

title: Good stay.
text: The location is very nice, close to everything. clean and spacious room and the staff was amazing, very friendly and receptive making everything to accommodate the guests needs and requests. I would recommend and stay another time for sure.

title: Very good
text: Very good and Jose and Lila were very helpful and nice! They accommodated us for our early check in! Very nice room and the staff was very helpful and nice. Room was clean and bed was very comfortable. I would definitely stay here again and the location was great!

title: Great visit
text:
Superb friendly and efficient welcome and advice
Brilliant location being near to Penn Street Station
Lila and Vicky concierg reception very helpfull
Empire State Maceys and good restaurants nearby. 
Easy transfers to NEWARK and JFK airport

title: Very friendly
text: Nice location , Jose did an awesome job taking care of our bags while we waited for check in . Lila and Vicky did awesome checking us in … very friendly and the hotel is clean ( even the manager was cleaning windows ) this is our second time staying here … ( before and after our cruise ) the rooftop bar is breath taking too

title: Vicky
text: Wasn’t sure if my room was confirmed stop back at the hotel later that morning and meet a very nice and rememberable young lady Name Vicky.  All hotel concierge‘s should have someone as pleasant and cheerful as her. Just watching Vicky handle the guess as she did, and even going out of her way without hesitation to get a guess something as simple as sugar!  Was amazing. I would gladly frequent this hotel knowing that she is part of the staff. Great people are hard to find, and she seems to be a keeper.  Room was nice and clean, Very roomy, I definitely will be booking at this location again. Thank you Vicky it was a pleasure!

title: Refund not provided
text:
Be warned about the free cancellation offered. I cancelled my booking on the 31st of January and still have not had the funds returned to me. Have tried emailing and was told it could take 6 weeks. This time has passed, recent emails haven’t been responded to and there is no sign of the thousands of dollars I am owed.

Unless you are 100% sure you are going to travel, I would look elsewhere.

title: DO NOT book this hotel. They DO NOT refund the money for "Free" Cancellation

The payment was made on the first day at the time of Reservation and I arrived for more than 47 days waiting for my Refund and nothing. Great care.

title: Terrible booking

title: DO NOT BOOK AT THIS HOTEL, THEY KEEP PEOPLE'S MONEY, BE VERY CAREFUL.

title: Disastrous
text: Disastrous! I made a reservation, I canceled within the free cancellation period. They have been with my money for MONTHS and don't say anything. The email they kindly ask you to write to in other users' comments is useless. I've been writing for months, they've responded once and no more. They take advantage of tourists because they believe that they will not be sued, it does not pay off. I will do it, no matter what it costs me, but this hotel is a joke.

title: Go ELSEWHERE
text: From the front door to the guest room, AWFUL!! We initially passed the hotel because the area around the entrance looked 'sketchy'!! When finally entered, there were three employees standing around a podium chatting and giggling, glanced at us and continued their conversation. The young lady at the front desk informed me that 'my card didn't go through because I made a cash payment to reserve the room'. 1) I received confirmation from Wyndham when I reserved and 2) how does one make a cash payment online/app? The hallways are dirty and the room was worse! The beds look more like those of a hostel or dorm room, walls in the room were filthy, there was a beer left in the fridge from a previous guest, all of which made us question the cleanliness of the beds since the rest of the room was a mess.  We flew in so I did not have all the cleaning supplies I usually have. There are only three channels, MeTV, ION and some channel that only shows westerns. It was a HORRIBLE stay!

title: SCAMMERS
text: Yet another scam. Booked on booking in January for October with free cancellation and after a few days I canceled when however the structure had already charged me the amount of almost 1200 euros on my credit card. Since then it has been hell...both booking and the hotel give no feedback...only emails or replies from operators with apologies and promises. title: I advise you not to book with this accommodation, since they charge a room and then if you cancel they will not refund your money

THIS HOTEL IS A SCAM

title: Problems with refund
text: I'm a little disappointed with this hotel. I made a reservation, paid for that reservation, where there was free cancellation. A few days later I found better rates at the same hotel and at the same period. I called them and informed them that I would like to make the exchange. They canceled the first reservation, created a new reservation in which I paid again. However, it has been more than 30 business days since I canceled and I have not received a refund for the first reservation. Mind you, I didn't cancel the stay with them, I just changed it. I paid twice and have not been refunded to date. I called the hotel, sent several emails, called costumer care and no one responded or helped me. A big regret.

title: Very bad, they don't refund the FREE cancellation!
text: I found myself canceling my reservation within the terms of free cancellation, despite this, AFTER MORE THAN A MONTH THE HOTEL DID NOT REFUND the amount taken from the credit card, despite many reminders via booking, having sent the documents that they requested (which there wouldn't even be a need for, given the THEORETICALLY FREE cancellation). There are also other reviews that say the same thing. BE CAREFUL!!!

title: DO NOT BOOK THIS HOTEL!!! NO REFUND!!!
text: I booked this hotel 9 months in advance for a stay in May this year. The amount was deducted from my credit card immediately. I have contacted Agoda, the hotel and even victoria@luxurbanhotels.com or refunds@luxurbanhotels.com. No replies!!! Agoda also said the hotel is not responding to their enquiries.

title: Good location, poor condition/standard. Only use if expecting bare minimum.
text:
I’d say this is a fair review of the hotel. First of all, the location is great and very central with a helpful subway station just outside the entrance. The entrance is easiest seen by “Monarch Rooftop Bar”. Other than a sign on the automatic door it is not clear where the hotel is. The lobby area could do with a bit of renovation to be more welcoming on first impressions. It is a small lobby but I’ve seen other hotels with much better with the size available.

The hallways are behind what you would expect of most hotels in modern times as well as the rooms (we only stayed in 1 ofc) themselves. There was damage to the carpet, a very basic bathroom and very few old storage spaces for a few nights stay. Ultimately though, it was clean and when only sleeping in the room, it is acceptable. There is a gym on the 4th floor which is again just acceptable. I did bear in mind it may have recently changed hands, maybe they will work on and improve the hotel but this wasn’t visible anywhere.

If you are similar to us and are visiting the city to explore and see what the city has to offer, this hotel is still below the average standard you would want but is acceptable and is generally cheaper per night than others.

If we were to visit again, we would select a different hotel for a better overall experience in the city. If you want anything other than a place to sleep, I would advise going elsewhere.

title: Stay away!!! No refunds!!!
text: This hotel never gives refunds. If you are not sure about your dates and are going to cancel, definitely stay away from this hotel because i made my reservation 31 january and cancelled 2 hours later via booking.com…over than a month has passed and I am still sending emails and I am not getting a refund.

title: Hotel doesn’t refund money

In total, the hotel owes me $1,512.82. But it doesn't refund, even though my bookings were refundable.

title: Not refunded

title: Do not reserve!!!
text: We have canceled the reservation through booking a month ago and they have not refunded us anything. The hotel does not respond to booking or to us, it is a real shame. We were going to stay at another hotel in the chain but in the end they are not an option. They are thiefs

title: Nice find
text:
Hotel located in the center, a stone's throw from Times Square and the Empire State Building.
King size double bed, comfortable and clean, spacious bathroom and large shower.
Our room had a wonderful view of the empire and Herald Square, I would happily stay there again for my next stay in my favorite city!

title: Awful!
text:
February 2024
Horrible! Room for three people with extra bed which should be called torture bed! The mattress springs sting your back, the mattress is so thin that you can feel the scrap metal of the sofa! Sleeping on the floor is worse! We arrived late at night after an 8-hour flight and the bed wasn't even made! The service at reception is just terrible, no solution, no empathy. We ask to change rooms and we are told that there are no more, which is necessary since there are some on the internet.

title: ALSO NOT REFUNDED 😡
text: Booked a free cancellation rate through Booking.com for December 2024. Cancelled on 1st February & still no refund. Have now seen as the other reviews with the same story. Can this be legal that this many people are waiting on a refund. Now starting to get seriously concerned. Think I will contact my credit card company to report suspicious payment. Do not book here.

title: They take the money and don't refund.
text:
Attention scam. I booked in December through Booking.
Planned stay for August 2024.
Structure with free cancellation until early August. The day after booking the entire stay was deducted. They never responded to emails, telephone number non-existent. Not even booking can contact them.

title: Stay somewhere else!!!! ---5 rating
text: --5 rating, Cancelled 8 months in advance of planned stay in November 2024. Hotel phone says number called is unavailable. Called cooperate help line twice. Day 12 on February 23, 2024 with no refund!!! Will update at a later date if anything changes. My advice is book another hotel and stay away from this one.

title: Refund delay
text: I booked the hotel in January 2024 for a stay in October 2024. I canceled the reservation within one day. I am waiting more than 30 days for my refund. The hotel is so far non-compliant with the refund rules, staying on their terms. The hotel is still responding to various reasons why it cannot proceed with the refund on time.

title: 150 Dollars to check in + 4 dollars to look after suitcase !
text:
First the good point, it's in a very convenient location for central New York.
Now the rest, no signage so cab driver wasn't sure we were at the right place. Reception is run by a couple of girls who really don't care if you are there or not. I was charged 150 us dollars on arrival for purchases on my room. This is impossible as  it has no bar or restaurant or mini bar, so they took my money for the week I was there plus another week after. Reception is tiny, not very welcoming. On departure we were told to pay 2 dollars per suitcase to leave them behind reception. another rip off, no other hotel I've stayed at in New York charges this, think it's just a money earner for the family member doing it.
Room, we had a superior double, don't be fooled by the photo, whilst the bed was comfy, the walls had black marks on them from the dusty AC, same for the curtains. Certainly not as light and airy as you see in the photos. Carpet was well worn and should be replaced. Room service was good , extra towels were supplied by the maid when we asked her.

title: 🚫ATTENTION/WARNING📣
text:
🚫ATTENTION/WARNING📣
DO NOT BOOK this refundable hotel on Booking.com
If you cancel your 100% Refundable hotel before the deadline, you will NOT be automatically reimbursed. Contacted the hotel directly to request refund and they told me to contact refunds@luxurbanhotels.com. Long story short, several emails and one month later I still have not been refunded.
AVOID AVOID AVOID

title: Would never recommend this hotel- customer service has been the worst
text:
I made a booking thru Booking.com for March 2024. Cancelled the booking on December 2023 within the cancellation policy deadline and after having cancelled still the hotel debited the amount of the booking from  my  credit card.

I have written several emails directly to the hotel to the refunds email as well as John´s email ( after calling several times I was told he is the manager) and no reply from anybody and of course the refund has not been done! If so, I would not be writing this review. I also emailed them thru Booking.com and no one has replied. It has been over 2 months since the amount was debited .

title: Go somewhere else
text:
I am here now.....ive only been here 24hrs and i would NOT recommend this place. 
I was promised coffee in the room.....i come back from a big day out today and ask where the kettle/coffee maker is. I was told that 1 would be located and bought to me. I also requested a cup so i could have a wine in my room. This was all requested before 7pm.
At 8pm, i phone down and ask, how are they going with these 2 basic requests?......yes, someone will bring it up.
Im the time ive had to wait, ive fallen asleep and have not had any staff attend my room. I crack it, go downstairs and NOW im told that - we dont have a coffee machine, due to people stealing them upon departure!!! So now they can not keep up their part of the deal when all i want is a flippin coffee in the morning and a glass of wine in the evening! 
It took mw going downstairs in my heightened jet lag state some 3hrs after my inital request to get anything done! 
This is NOT a hotel, but a "different" hostel at best. 
I would like a room upgrade due to the incompetience as i doubt i can last another 8 nights here! 
Ohhhhhh & enjoy the whole 6 channels on the TV......a real throw back to the early 90's and black and white era. SOOOOOOOO BAD!

title: never booking any chain of Wyndham
text: I booked it through their website and canceled it after a week as the plans changed which was within 30 days of the cancellation policy. I still have not gotten my refund of 4675.78 USD. I called the 212-542-5060 hotel number as well as the TM Collection number. The hotel would give me a refund@luxurban email and they would not reply. @TM Collection by Wyndham customer service would not help but lie. One rep said they could not see the total price, so they sent me a cheque and the other one said they could not see any cheque being sent. I am glad my plan changed and did not need my money at the time. My credit card has been charging me interest on for two months. Just stay away from them people.

title: Good location
text:
The hotel is ideally located, close to everything and there is a metro station just below the hotel. The staff are friendly and friendly, especially John.
Small downside in terms of cleanliness, the carpet was not vacuumed. Otherwise comfortable bedding.

title: Well located and quiet.
text: Quick check in, very friendly, 3 elevators, always available and spacious, clean room, zero noise, perfect air. The location is the best, everything at hand. Metro station 20 steps away, buses, near Madison, Penn Station, Time Square walking distance. I would return without hesitation.

title: Unique and wonderful experience
text:
As when the place is bad we make a point of criticizing, I have to come here and praise when we find something good.
I started researching hotels in New York and was scared by the prices for hotels close to Times Square and the surrounding area. When I was about to give up, I found The Herald with a price within my expectations and a good location.
Well, when I arrived at the hotel I realized that it was MUCH better than I thought. The location is excellent, there is a 5-storey Macys and an H&M on the corner, less than 20m from the hotel there is a metro station that takes you to the most important points of the city, not to mention it is about 10-15min walking from Times Square, which always meant we ended the day by taking a stroll there. The room is spacious, we left our suitcases open every day and didn't even come close to stepping on or bumping into them. IMMENSE bed and wonderful bathroom, hot shower that heats up quickly, as well as an excellent staff. Everyone was very patient and always willing to meet all our requests. We had to pay US$150.00 when we arrived as a deposit, which was immediately refunded at check out.
And the best part, our check out was at 11 am and our flight was at 11:30 pm, they spared no effort to keep our bags so we could enjoy the rest of our day. Well, if today I can say that I had a great trip, a good part is due to the great experience I had with the hotel, I recommend it with my eyes closed to anyone going to New York

title: Awesome staff & location
text:
John and Jose were a delight! They gave us a very warm welcome and helped us with an early check-in that made our day. 

Room is clean and comfortable, awesome location and a relatively affordable price for the location. really nothing to complain about

title: The Best hôtel
text:
Bonjour. Merci beaucoup d’avoir répondu à nos exigences sans modification.  Les lits et les service sont super. Là chambre est incroyablement propre et la vue est super. vous êtes les meilleures BERNA, SAM et ASHE. 

Cordialement famille WASSEN.

title: Real Gem
text:
Perfect downtown hotel. Convenient location with generous size rooms and helpful staff.
Has everything you need and more, in the heart of NY
Very comfortable beds and clean.
Nicole and Hose were great, very helpful and kind.
Highly recommend!

title: Great stay !
text: We were warmly welcomed by Mina and Gil, who were very kind ! Our room was perfect, spacious and comfortable and the shower very clean too. We loved out stay even if it was only for one night - if it were a little cheaper we would have gladly stayed two!

title: Great service by the staff
text: Greatly enjoyed the stay here. I would recommend to anyone visiting from outside the city. Great spot with all of the necessities nearby as well as tourist attractions. Clean rooms with great views of the city. Mantha and Gill were super helpful and accommodating!

title: Most perfect experience ever!
text: I had the most amazing time as always. The hotel is beautiful, lots of families, couple, it has an awesome room and rooftop view! Berna in the reception made my stay perfect! She’s lovely, very polite and friendly! I came to spent my anniversary! Thank you Berna and the whole team!!

title: Excelente experiencia
text: Excelente servicio de Lila y Gil. Las llamadas siempre fueron respondidas. Nos acomodaron las habitaciones como habían acordado. El servicio excelente y las habitaciones estaban listas antes de tiempo.  100 por ciento recomendado. Buena limpieza

title: Great location, comfortable rooms and helpful staff !
text: I think this is the most comfortable and affordable hotel in NYC. We had a great room with a wonderful view. During our one-week stay, Berna, Nicole and Jose were always smiling at the front desk and were available to help us with  everything we needed. Great location, clean, comfortable rooms ,great staff and affordable price. I assume you can have it all after all :-)

title: Amazing!
text: We had the warmest welcome by Jon, Lina and Gil. They made sure we could check in early and even gave us an upgrade. This was a really nice way to start our trip in NYC. They also explained some things to us about the location. The room was clean and had a nice view. The bed was really comfortable. If I ever come back to NYC, this will definitely be the hotel I’m staying.

title: Must stay here if you come to new york
text: This is my first tome to  stay here. Great location right next to Times Square. but first of all thank you for Jon and Gil for welcome us like family . The room in the 7th floor was perfect size . Bathroom lovely with rain shower head and good pressure. Not alot of counter space though. Room very clean. Front desk service friendly and helpful excellent customer service.easy for transportation and walk too many places

title: Great value for the money
text:
I was here in Jan 2024

paid $110 for a double rooom

great location

clean room and sheets

had a great rest

friendly staff

fridge/iron/hairdrier available

there is also a terrace and a gym available

the lighting could be a bit better in the room and bathroom

title: Einmal und Nie wieder
text:
Dieses Hotel ist in die Jahre gekommen. Personal teils inkompetent. Gäste werden versucht zu betrügen.

title: One of the Best Experiences in New York City!
text: Great location and service! The staff members, Jon, Jose, and Lila are amazing. Although I arrived at the hotel a bit early, they were so kind to check us in earlier. The room was spacious with a breathtaking view of the Empire State Building.

title: Good service
text: They are very kind for early check in because we bring baby.. thank you for Jon, Lila and Jose.. best hotel and near from best spot in NYC.. the room are clean and  big.. we will keep our luggage too, very cheap for it.. we’ll come back to this hotel also

title: Great location
text:
I recommend this hotel. Jon, Jose, and Lila at the counter were friendly and allowed me to check-in 5 hours early. 

Great location to visit landmarks, get to Hudson yards, or to move south or north in the island. The room I stayed in had a great view of the Empire State Building.

title: Lovely hotel, comodo y muy céntrico
text: Jose & Jon  very nice people, they help us a lot to get around the city gave us a very lovely welcome, a super nice room with a lovely view definitely will be coming back, los recomiendo, habitaciones limpias y todo estaba en orden nos encanto mucho

title: Excellent
text: Excellent service from Jon, Lila and Jose. We had a very Warm welcome. Location fantastic.we were central to every spot we wished to visit. The hotel was clean, comfortable and perfect for us. Will definitely return when we come back to New York city.

title: 👍
text: The location is quick access to subway. The room was clean and the bed was comfy. Staffs namely Vera, Lila and Jose were very friendly at check in and were helpful and kind too. Near to Ktown with lots of asian food options. Enjoyed my stay here!!

title: Came early just to check our bags in and were told the room was already ready for us! 4 hours early! Amazing!
text: Lila, Jon, and Jose were so much help! They were so sweet and accommodating. Love it! We came 4 hours early just expecting to check our bags in, and we were told our room was already ready for us! Room looks great!

title: Review
text: It’s my first day here, the room is spacious and nice, the hotel is in the middle of the city. Jon the receptionist is such a nice person, he helped me check in early and suggested guidance for attraction areas. 😊

title: New York 2024
text: Great trip, helpful and kind staff thanks to Jon & Lila. Hope to visit again soon. Looking to explore more in the warmer months and hoping to return here for our stay. Great amenities, walking distance to everything, and more.

title: Probably my fav hotel here because of the staff and location. :)
text: We stayed here for a week. The room was so nice and clean. The staff were very accommodating and friendly. Especially Berna, Nicole and Ashe. They were so warm and hospitable. Would visit here again on my next visit to nyc.

title: Perfect for our stay...
text: 10 out of 10 for room size, cleanliness, views, location and staff. Wouldn't hesitate to book again. Our room was serviced daily with clean towels etc and perfect value for an NYC hotel. On prior visits to the city we have paid much more and received much less.

title: Exceptional Hospitality: A Warm Welcome and Outstanding Service!
text: Exceptional service from Jon, Nicole, and Jose! Their warm welcome and flexibility with an early check-in made our stay memorable. Their professionalism and genuine care for guests were evident throughout. Their dedication to ensuring our comfort was remarkable. We truly appreciated their efforts, which made a huge difference to our experience. Jon, Nicole, and Jose exceeded our expectations, and we highly commend them for their outstanding hospitality. Thank you for making our stay extraordinary!

title: Excelente servicio
text: Excelente servicio desde que llegamos. Nos atendieron muy amables en la entrada Jon, Nicole y José. Siempre que vengo a NY me hospedo aquí. Habitaciones limpias. Área accesible a todo hasta para tomar el tren.

title: My visit to New York
text:
Great location, excellent place to stay very central close to many restaurants and mobility adicionallu lila, Jon and Gil were very welcoming
El Lugar es muy agradable tiene una excelente ubicación, se encuentra muy cerca al comercio, restaurantes con muy buena conexión a los lugares turísticos excelente atención

title: Excelente experiencia
text: Great location!!! lila- Jon anda Gil were very welcoming. Exelent unication. Cerca a todo seguro, buenos restaurantes para todo gusto y precio. Reciben tu equipaje antes de la hora de cheking. Súper eevomendado

title: The Herald - Midtown NYC
text: Jon and Gil welcomed me very warmly and accommodated an early check-in for me. Nice view of Macy’s. Comfy mattress, very short walk from the Penn station (took the train from Newark airport and saved $$$ taking the train)! Great location in Midtown Manhattan… Walking distance to all major attractions! highly recommended!

title: Location, location, location!
text:
The Herald is in a great location and has very affordable pricing. It's easy to find, the rooms are sizeable and it has everything you need from a hotel in the heart of Manhattan.

John & Jose were great as well, making check-in easy and personal.

I would recommend staying here!

title: Localização excelente
text:
Localização excelente, com acesso ao metro na calçada do hotel. Fácil acesso caminhando para atrações turísticas, como Times Square, Bryant Park, entre outros.
Pessoal da recepção muito atencioso, com destaque para o pessoal do turno da manhã, foram muito gentis e solicitos conosco.

title: Consigliatissimo
text: L’hotel è in una posizione perfetta, veramente vicino alle principali attrazioni ma anche alla metto con cui muoversi ovunque. Pulito,cambio asciugamano giornaliero e possibilità di lasciare i bagagli al costo di 2$ a valigia. A parte qualche problema iniziale perché non riuscivano a far funzionare le carte per il deposito(ma alla fine ha funzionato) per il deposito (che comunque Agoda, tramite cui ho prenotato, non ne aveva fatta menzione) è andato tutto molto bene. Il ragazzo che ci ha accolto la prima sera e con cui poverino non riuscivamo a comunicare è stato carinissimo. Devo dire che ci tornerei assolutamente! Disponibilità phon in camera.

title: Fantastic location for the money
text: We recently stayed in this hotel and had a fantastic time. The location of this hotel is amazing, especially for the price. Yes, the rooms may be basic but you get what you pay for. If you just need to get some sleep before heading out to explore again, then this hotel is ideal. The rooms were cleaned daily and the staff were really friendly.  However, John and Jose were exceptional. We needed some help one day with one of our booked trips, which had been cancelled at the last minute. They went above and beyond to help us and even gave us a great recommendation as to what we could do that day instead. They are a credit to this hotel. Thank you John and Jose; your kindness was much appreciated.

title: Really great experience !!!
text: Great customer service, Mr. Jhon when we did the check in, very helpful, always ready to answer any questions. Liza the room maid , always ready to help. We have a really great experience, the hotel is in a really good area, very close to many different points.

title: Buona sistemazione
text:
Hotel sulla 34sima che permette di raggiungere comodamente tutti i luoghi di maggiore interesse in Manhattan sia piedi che con  la metro Herald Square appena fuori la porta.
Ingresso e reception minuscoli.
Camere ampie e semplici ma con tutto cio che può servire.
Letti un poco piccoli e materassi un po  molli.
Insonorizzazione buona.
Personale gentilissimo.
Possibilità di lasciare i bagagli in deposito.

title: Be aware!!
text:
I made a booking 6 months in advance, and then subsequently had to cancel my booking due to a change in schedule. The Herald by LuxUrban then took full payment from my credit card after the booking was cancelled. They then advised that they cannot refund the money for at least 30 business days.
Be very careful booking with this hotel!

title: Fraudulent Practices
text:
DO NOT BOOK with this hotel. I booked with Luxurban due to their free cancellation policy. Unfortunately, due to personal circumstances I had to cancel my trip which I did well within the FREE cancellation period. However, I was shocked to find that I was CHARGED the full amount of my stay. I read in the fine print that this may happen and that the full amount will be refunded after 30 days - it has now been 35 days and there is no refund in my account. This is completely unacceptable, terrible customer service, and quite frankly an abuse of trust.

I fear that it is a complete scam and I am unfortunately a lot of dollars out. 
I am shocked at the lack of customer service by luxurban. I do not recommend this company to anyone due to the way they have dealt with this situation.

title: Incredible Hotel Choice!
text: John, Brenna, and the rest of the staff are simply awesome! Always SO kind and accommodating when we come to the city. Prices are fair for the awesome incredibly convenient location! We will be regulars here for as long as they'll have us!

title: Not a location to recommend.
text: The room I stayed in was expectedly on the small side, the paint in the room was chipped and dirty, as were the public spaces. I’m dumbfounded at the satisfaction ratings of others who’ve stayed in the same hotel.

title: Exceptional service, great location, very clean.
text: On arrival we were greeted with smiling faces from Jon, Lila and Gil who were incredibly accommodating and made us feel very welcome. Our room was clean, and the beds were very comfortable. Its not a large room but not too small, just right for a New York adventure. The location is the best just across from Macy's,  shops and restaurants.

title: Best staff of our trip!
text: What an amazing welcome to New York! The most amazing team greeted us on arrival and made sure we had everything we needed including information on nearby landmarks and tips. Settled into our spotlessly clean room with really comfy beds. Great rooms great location. Big shout out to Jon, Lila and Gil for such exceptional service and making us feel so welcome.

title: Une bonne expérience
text:
Hotel bien situé, chambre confortable et joli cadre. L'équipe de l'hôtel est aux petits soin, merci pour le service client ! 
Seul bémol, le ménage pourrait être plus poussé tant dans la chambre que dans la salle de bain.

title: Great location, but noisy and basic
text:
Stayed for 5 nights in The Herald. The location was by far the best pro of this hotel, we had a lovely view of the Empire State Building and Macy’s. The traffic noise at the crossroad of 34th Street was extremely noisy however with sirens and horns at all hours. 

Our room on the 15th floor was spacious and clean. The shower water pressure was not great and the toilet flush a bit dodgy. Unfortunately no vanity area or mirror outside of the bathroom.

title: Mixed feelings
text:
This is our 3rd visit to the NYC first time this hotel, on arrival we were a bit put off by the tiny lobby packed with suitcases and nothing else, the reception staff seemed pleasant enough, we asked for a twin room as I was visiting with my brother, unfortunately none available so we had to share a double bed. We had a suite so the room was huge spacious with amazing views, clean & comfortable. 

The 2nd night our friends room shower broke and flooded the whole room , they had maintenance in their room until 4am, soaking wet floors and no offer of another room, luckily one stayed in with me the other stayed in her room as she didn’t want to leave her belongings, no offer of offering other rooms , extra towels blankets. This was absolutely appalling, attitude from the staff that night was unacceptable, they were both freezing and didn’t sleep.

Now the “ monarch “ rooftop bar I don’t think is actually the hotel , door staff are rude and if your face doesn’t fit you aren’t allowed up there.

The saviour of this hotel ? Jose. 

He’s a saint and should be working in a better hotel with better staff.

I wouldn’t recommend this hotel and I wouldn’t stay again.

title: Disappointing - Stay away from this one....
text:
A dear friend booked a one night stay for my husband and I for December 2nd. We drove into Manhattan. Here are some details of my experience.
1.  No sign anywhere for Lux Urban or Wyndham - after searching the street in the chaos of Herald Square, we called the hotel and were told "There is no sign. We are working on it. It says Monarch over the entry doors".
2. Enter the so called lobby for check in. Reception desk in a tiny space packed with suitcases which immediately sparked my suspicions as to the accommodations offered. Our friend booked the room on booking.com and called ahead to add our names to the reservation the day before. It took several attempts for them to find our names. I overheard one of the girls saying "it's the last room, give it to them". I questioned that and was told "we are overbooked and work on a first come, first serve basis". That was also not my idea of what I would expect a Wyndham hotel policy to be with a room booked and confirmed in advance.
3. I was given a key to room 403 and when I got off the elevator, the attached photos are what I saw.
4.  I entered the room and was surprised by the sparse and stark furnishings, minimal bedding, no mirror and no lamps.  Lighting was horrendous. Furnished more like a college dorm or hostel. We were to arrive at the hotel, get dressed for an engagement party nearby and stay at the hotel overnight. The one thing that struck me after seeing what the hallway looked like to make me decide I could not stay there was the smell. The smell of other people's body odor or sweat filled the room.
5. I returned to the reception desk and told them I was uncomfortable staying there. I was told the room is not refundable after you check in. She said the photos of the rooms are on the website. Yes, but you can't see stink in the photos nor do they show photos of the hall. 
So we returned to our vehicle, could not attend the party and drove home.

title: A Good Choice
text:
The hotel was in an excellent location, just across from Herald Sq & Macy’s dept store, ideal for walking to various sites & attractions, the subway was closeby, it was near Penn Stn, (Madison Sq Gardens) approx a 10-15 min walk. Bryant Park, Rockefeller Plaza all close.  
The hotel does not have a glamorous  entry or luxurious lobby & the room was a bit compact but it had everything we needed. The room was a comfortable temperature & did not feel stuffy., We felt safe, it was quiet for sleeping at the same time close to a heavy traffic area. 
The bed was comfortable, the bedding was fine. Plenty of hot water for showering, good plush towels. Room had a small refrigerator, a room safe. Wifi worked well at all times. 
I must mention that the staff on duty the day we arrived were very welcoming & helpful-Lila,  Jose, Joni & as a bonus we were able to check in on arrival in late morning.  
The roof top bar was busy the night we stopped in, it would be a terrific spot in the summer as well. 
When we return to NYC this is probably the place we will chose to stay.

title: Ottima sosta per chi deve viaggiare anche fuori New York
text:
Posizione strategica di fronte all’Empire State Building, zona super centrale di Manhattan, camera confortevole e dotata di tutti gli accessori. Gentili alla reception . Unica pecca ; non è ben segnalata  l’insegna dell’albergo.

Comunque consigliatissimo

title: Perfetto
text:
Hotel all’angolo tra la sesta e la trentacinquesima! Ottima posizione per girare la città! 
Hotel con ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo e, se fortunati come me, con una vista stupenda! Avevo una camera al 14 esimo piano con armadio frigo e cassaforte! Pulizia giornaliera garantita! 
Al quarto piano sono presenti una palestra ( con tanto di refil di acqua per borracce) e stanza comune con terrazzo con microonde a disposizione degli ospiti e macchinette per snack e bevande! 
Super consigliato per un soggiorno a NY

title: Great option!
text:
Great location! Amazing service’ John from Front desk and Jose from the bell stand provide an amazing experience helping us with everything!
Metro is just next to the hotel and if you are going to the parade , it’s a great option!
10 minutes walking distance from Times square , Empire State and 5 minutes to fifth  avenue and Korean town!

title: Lila y Jon son lo máximo!
text:
Llegas al hotel y es una amabilidad impresionante!
Super bien ubicado y el costo vs lo que ofrecen es excelente!! Lila y Jon son increíbles, de verdad mucha amabilidad por parte de ellos, muy limpio! MUY MUY lindo

title: Super Location for NYC
text: The Herald at 71 W 35 in New York was a great place to stay for a couple of nights. The location is fantastic. The staff really went out of their way to make our stay as comfortable as possible. Jon, Vicky and Vera were super helpful and friendly. Jose in particular went out of his way to help us. He gave us great tips for getting theatre tickets. When we were leaving, he carried our largest suitcase down two flights in the subway to get us on our way to JFK.

title: Excellent Location with great Customer service!
text: Front desk is very helpful especially Lita, John and Jose. The room was very roomy and clean. This place is at an excellent location on Herald Square which made everything within a walking distance. I wouldn’t mind staying here again.

title: Worst hotel experience I've ever had.
text:
The staff in the lobby were great.  My kids got us this hotel for a Christmas gift last year. It was so I could fulfill my dream of seeing the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade in person.  The lobby staff were the nicest thing about this hotel. 
When you got to the floor, it felt like we were in the basement of an office building. Everything was minimal. No decorations in the hall. Even when you talked normally, your voice would echo in the hallway.  
In the room things didn't get batter.  The pictures on here are not what we walked into. Our room has no decorations, there was no desk, coffee maker, or microwave. Windows were dirty as well.  
The morning of checkout, staff was knocking on our door every 20 minutes beginning at 8:15 to make sure we were leaving.  Checkout wasn't until 11, and we were allowed to stay until 11:30, but every 20 minutes they knocked on the door to see if we were going to leave.  
While the lobby staff were very nice (even though I was told not to leave a review unless it was a good one), that was the only nice thing about this hotel.  I would not recommend it to anyone.  If you want to see New York, spend a little more and stay at a better hotel. There is a HIlton right nextdoor to this one. I'd look there instead.

title: Great Experience
text:
Estivemos durante 3 dias das nossas férias em Nova York e nos hospedamos no hotel Herald. um hotel super bem localizado (no coração de NY), próximo a Times Square, limpo, confortável, recepcionistas muito educados, além de receberem nossas encomendas compradas na internet sem problema algum. super recomendo e sem dúvida ficaremos lá novamente em uma próxima oportunidade.

We were in New York for 3 days of our vacation and stayed at the Herald hotel. a super well located hotel (in the heart of NY), close to Times Square, clean, comfortable, very polite receptionists, in addition to receiving our orders purchased on the internet without any problems. I highly recommend it and we will definitely stay there again next time

title: Great receptionist!
text:
Amazing! 
Jon in the front desk very kind! We have just arrived in thaksgiving and we really loved the receptionist kindness to solve our check in issues! We really liked the location, nearby the times square and it could be a great point of start when you are in NY ;)

title: Honestly one of the best time we had in a hotel in New York!
text: Thanks to Jon our front desk host,  he was super polite, welcoming, and very attentive! The room is super comfortable, in great condition, very clean, the room we had has a great view to the Thanksgiving parade. So if you want a great place to stay and at the same time enjoy the views this one is worth it!!!!

title: Macy’s parade hotel
text: My family and I went for thanksgiving because we wanted to watch the parade and it was in such a perfect location and the staff were so nice and helpful! We stayed in room 908 and had a lovely view! Staff were very kind to us and made sure we have a great time

title: Good room for one
text: I was in NYC for a one day video shoot and booked this hotel because it was near the location where I needed to be. I arrived after 10pm and a bit of a trouble locating the building. It's not obvious from the street where the hotel is because the signs outside are for the roof top bar. Once inside I was checked in by the staff and from that point on it was smooth sailing. The hotel is in a fun part of the city and walkable to a lot of great eateries. The hotel room wasn't brand new, but it was clean and comfortable. If I needed to go back for a second shoot I would book the same hotel room again.

title: Great Front Desk
text: John and Mia  at front desk were quick and personable. The room was clean and has everything you’d need. Nice view of city and Macy’s. Looking forward to going to rooftop bar that the front desk told us about.

title: Good location and good service.
text: Excellent service from Lila,Jon and Jose.  Lila made all posible to place me in a room closer to Macy's and the Empire State Bldg. and also the early check-in. José explained the wolking distance attraction and the map. I recommend it.

title: The best
text: Excelente servicio, thanks to Jon, Jose, Lila. Fueron muy amables y nos trataron muy bien. Nos dieron la mejor habitación para ver el Macys parade. Definitivamente nos trataron super desde que entramos y servicio en español.

title: Unique
text: The customer service Is the best there is great, this is one of the best place to stop by if you want to see the parade on the holidays with the family and the rooms are also great as well, and the bathroom are clean which is great as well.

title: Great Experience!!
text: Jon and Jose at the front desk were amazing! Very accommodating and really saved us some time and effort checking in! All the staff was amazing! The hotel was in a great location and we will definitely be back!

title: Hidden gem hotel
text:
Super service from front desk Jon and his friends, we can have early check in while its freezing outside , perfect hotel for visiting new york, all just walk away from hotel, the room is big enough for me and 3 of my family
Definitely will come back again to book this hotel if i visit NYC
See u again and be consistent with your service ..superb

title: Hospedaje
text: habitación confortable , buena ubicación en el centro de la ciudad y sobretodo muy agradables en la recepción , Jon y José, quienes me atendieron . Recomiendo este sitio a todo aquel que quiera visitar la ciudad

title: Great Service!
text: Excellent service! Jon and Jose were very friendly and understanding when I arrived super early for check in. It’s such a relief not having to drag my luggage all over the city. Thank you both so much for all your help!!!

title: Convenient location, clean, but some problems
text: The location is convenient, and there are nice views of Herald Square. The room was clean. But beware that the “Standard” room does not have floor lamps or bedside lamps or any lamps at all. There is only an overhead fluorescent light that is uncomfortably bright and there is no way to dim the light aside from turning it off. I called and asked for a lamp and they told me that because I had booked a “Standard” room, lamps were not included, even though the room photos on the Wyndham app showed lamps. The luggage storage for guests arriving prior to the 3pm check-in time was complimentary but there was no one matching claim checks to luggage when we picked up our bags. The bags were stored in a hallway that was within the sight of the front desk clerk, but there was nothing to stop anyone from taking bags that weren’t theirs. I did not notice anything stolen from my bags, however. The housekeeping staff was confused and thought I was checking out a day earlier than was on my reservation. Even after telling them this, they repeatedly tried to re-enter my room, sometimes without even knocking at all. Be sure to engage the manual lock if you stay here. There is no seating in the lobby of the hotel; it does not really feel like a hotel on the ground floor at all, as it is basically a hallway with a tiny kiosk up against the wall. It served our needs but it felt more like a college dorm than a hotel that I had spent hundreds of dollars for.

title: Great experience
text: Great experience. Thanks to Lila and the hotel staff! We stayed for a week and the location was simply perfect - we could see the Empire Estate building from the window of our room! I would totally recommend it.

title: Best sleep ever in NYC
text:
Great hotel. The staff are so helpfull
Best location to get around NYC.Subway outside door. Also a food truck at the main door. Best coffee in the morning. 

Rooms very clean and comfortable.
Best and most comfortable beds ever. Only issue have to pay 2 dollars per bag if you are checking out and need to leave bags for a couple of hours.

title: Great place to stay for business trip and even better hospitality
text: Jon and Gill went above and beyond for us. The hospitality was amazing. Gave us a lot of recommendations for food and some great local spots for bagels and coffee. Was able to check in early and take my bags to the room before the  business conference. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Vicky- Guest relations is Super helpful, and very kind!
text: I have not yet stayed at the property, however, I will be later this month. I called to speak to someone at the front desk, and was connected to Vicky. She was extremely helpful, and accommodating, and knowledgable. I was really impressed as her willingness to help, and over kindness on the phone. Unfortunately, its a rare thing to experience these days. I am looking forward to my stay based on the customer service I have received  thusfar.

title: NYC Sweet Spot
text: Lila was exceptionally kind at the front desk.  The entire staff upon check in was very pleasant and accommodating.  Great location just off of Broadway. Very close to Macy’s if shopping is your thing.  Room was perfect for one person. Very happy

title: Great stay and perfect location!
text: I enjoyed my stay at The Herald. Customer service was great! I arrived early from the airport to the hotel on a very very cold New York morning and Jon was great with assisting me and I was able to check in very quickly. Jon also was able to tell me about different places in the area and the best way to get there. He was so helpful, even after checking out of the hotel. When looking for the hotel, make sure to look for the signs of the hotel because it’s easy to miss but it is located in the perfect location next to the Hilton Garden Inn, has a rooftop bar called The Monarch, near all the shops, right next to the subway station (which is very helpful) and in walking distance of all the “touristy” places. Check out was easy and I was even able to leave my luggage after I checked out which was a bonus. Definitely will stay again when visiting New York!

I walked in and was greeted so graciously by Lila, Jon, Gil! They were all so kind and friendly!  Lila helped with checking me in and did a phenomenal job making the check in process so smooth and for wife some context -

title: A éviter ABSOLUMENT
text: A éviter absolument ! Comme de nombreux autres clients, j'ai été débité du montant de mon séjour. Après annulation gratuite, j'ai dû attendre près de 2 mois pour me faire rembourser ( alors que le délai maximum est d'un mois). Ils ont d'abord inventé le concept de 30  business day ( 30 jours ouvrés) pour gagner 15 jours effectifs. Ensuite, malgré mes relances, plus de nouvelles... J'ai donc dû saisir Booking pour une intervention directe. Je n'ai finalement reçu mon remboursement que 2 mois après. Irrespect total des engagements contractuels. Inadmissbile !!!

title: Utilitarian hotel. OK place, good location..
text: Not a hidden gem, but OK hotel if you get it for less than 200 a night. Check in line is 10 to 20 people and two elevators for 17 floors means you’re always waiting for the elevator, lobby, not attractive at all but the rooms are fairly nice. Good location, near lots of restaurants, bars, Macy’s, department store, etc…

title: Vale la pena por la ubicación
text:
Nos alojamos solo la última noche de nuestro viaje ya que volvíamos de Filadelfia y el vuelo salía temprano por la mañana. Lo mejor es la ubicación, cerca del metro y bien comunicado.
El ingreso es medio caótico ya que es la misma entrada del rooftop Monarch y no tienen lobby. 
La habitación es simple, mobiliario viejo pero tiene minibar. Para una noche está bien.

title: No refound yet
text:
Be careful with them. Booked a 10 days stay on 01/09/2023 for 1900 USD.
Cancelled few minutes later as I notice a full charge of the amount on my credit card (this was not clearly stated during the booking process but ok, my fault).
Refound should be issued within 30 days but as today 18/10/2023, no refound on my credit card balance. I've contacted them several time and they answer always the same: we are working on it, please wait and so on.
I've open a dispute with the third party booking website in order to get the money back, I hope to get the amount back this way.
No matter what they will answer here, this is something very close to  a scam. I've cancelled other reservation in my life and the refound tipically takes no more than 5/7 days. 
The way they work is clearly intentional.
Stay away from them no matter what they answer here.

title: Wonderful stay
text:
The hotel is centrally located few blocks away from Times square. Easily accessible by the subway, one of the exits are right next to the hotel's entrance. Our room was spacious and clean with a good view of Herald Square, it also had a mini fridge and a coffee maker.
I liked that late at night, the hotel door closes and can be unlocked with the room key only so it gave us the sense of security.
There is also a room on the 4th floor where you can use the microwave to heat food or boil water for a hot drink. Did not try the gym but I checked it out and was just right for someone on a vacation and not wanting to miss basic workouts.
The gym had a drinking water dispenser that we used to fill our water bottles.
They do not charge facility fee is an added value to the hotel.
Definitely, will stay again!

title: Ottima posizione. Un po’ rumoroso
text: Posizione eccellente, proprio sulla sesta strada. Hotel semplice ma funzionale. Pulito ma abbastanza basic nelle forniture. L’insonorizzazione andrebbe curata un po’ meglio perché la strada è davvero rumorosa e le camere dei primi 3 piani ne risentono. La camera era abbastanza spaziosa, con una tv sufficientemente grande e anche un piccolo armadio per i vestiti. Presente anche la cassaforte e un frigo. Al check in si possono lasciare le valigie gratuitamente anche se si arriva prima. Al check out si pagano 8$.

title: Bad customer service & hotel charges yet to berefunded
text: My trip was booked for next year in April 2024. I canceled my booking right after I realize they charged me for the hotel thinking it was free cancellation with no charge up until before the date of travel. I was told 30 business days but it has been over 30 business days. No one to contact for refund status. Was given a managers email scott@luxurbanhotels.com. Scott stated he doesn’t deal with refund & to tell me to give them a little more time. I asked him if there’s anyone I can contact to ask for refund status. Never got a reply back from Scott. The reviews I read & reply from the hotel the email they provide reviews@luxurbanhotels.com does not work. I tried emailing but did not go through. This is very bad business. I will report them to the Better Business Bureau & will have to resort to my credit card company for a refund & they will go after them. This is ridiculous. Do not book this hotel if you are for certain you will stay there only. After this experience I will never stay there.

title: In the heart of the city!
text: Great location! Close to the Empire State Building. Walking distance to Times Square, Central Park and other great places, but also easy access to very nice neighborhoods like Chelsea, Greenwich Village and more... Herald Square across the street from the hotel, which gives you access to many subway lines. The hotel gives you access to a nice little terrace a couple stories up, but there is also a nice rooftop bar in the same building, with a great view of the ESB. Staff was nice and helpful. Room was clean and convenient. Very good hotel, in the heart of the city at a great price! Would definitely book again!

title: Overall Experience
text:
Overall environment was great, the house keeper Michelle was amazing, every day she made sure to ask if we needed room service and respected the privacy. 

The room was big enough for a couple, great view. Obviously the sirens, car noises will be there so be sure to bring earplugs. The only thing that wasnt working was the tv and front desk gentleman was much of a big help. 

Everything else, the hotel location was very convenient having a subway station right outside the entrance.

title: An Amazing Experience
text: The best hotel! Prime location and very nice and helpful stuff. We will come back for sure! It’s close to everything by walk and there is a subway station right next. The room is very spacious and clean:)

title: Excellent hotel manager and staff
text: My family and I picked this hotel to view the 2023 Thanksgiving Day Parade from. The manager Scott went above and beyond to assign us with a suite that has the best view of the parade route. All of the employees are very kind and helpful. We are looking forward to our trip.

title: Hotel não recomendado
text: O hotel é extremamente caro para oferecer apenas o básico. Os recepcionistas não são simpáticos (deveriam fazer um curso sobre como tratar adequadamente o hóspede), a limpeza do quarto é péssima, se restringe a apenas arrumar a cama e trocar as tolhas do banheiro. Não trocam os copos sujos, não aspiram o pó do carpete, não limpam dentro do box do chuveiro, etc. Nos sites do hotel, do Booking.com e do Hoteis.com, mostram uma recepção linda, mas não há esta recepção no hotel. Efetivamente a recepção funciona no andar térreo, é como uma recepção de uma oficina mecânica, feia, sem decoração, sem sofás para os hóspedes, as malas ficam armazenadas no corredor, ou seja, sem nenhum tipo de conforto. Os hóspedes tem que ficar em pé quando estão na recepção esperando pelo transporte, por um amigo, etc. Ficamos em 2 quartos e em nenhum deles o cofre estava funcionando. A TV funcionava em apenas 1 canal. Foi feita reclamação em 2 ocasiões, mas ninguém compareceu aos quartos para resolver. No dia 06/09 havia um bilhete no chão do quarto, pedindo desculpas por não terem feito a limpeza naquele dia, pois havia muitos hóspedes e havia falta de funcionários. Isto é inconcebível para um hotel de boa qualidade. Os hotéis já sabem previamente a quantidade de hospedes que terão para planejar a quantidade de funcionários que serão necessários para fazer a limpeza dos quartos. Além disto tudo, o hotel fez uma cobrança inadequada em meu cartão de crédito, sem me informar o motivo.  Apesar da boa localização, não recomendo a estadia neste hotel.

title: Mooi gelegen, magere service
text: Wij waren met 2 volwassen en 2 tieners. Voor dit gezelschap was de kamer krap en de bedden te smal. Ontvangst viel tegen. Er is geen lobby. Je komt in een donkere kleine ruimte met een kleine desk als receptie. Personeel was vaak met andere dingen bezig en gaf ons geen welkom gevoel. Als je ze aansprak waren ze wel aardig maar niet proactief. Schoonmaak kwam niet elke dag langs en wij moesten geregeld om wc papier en andere benodigdheden vragen. Vloerbedekking vonden we viezig. Locatie was perfect. Naast metro ingang en op loopafstand van time square en bryantpark.

title: Correcto
text: Escogimos este hotel por la relación precio ubicación. Las opiniones no eran muy buenas en el momento de la reserva y algunas eran ciertas. La habitación era grande, pero no se ajustaba a la foto que nos mostraron cuando hicimos la reserva. No todos los días pasaron a limpiar y hacer las camas, van justos de personal. Las habitaciones exteriores de la quinta planta muy ruidosas, se oye mucho la calle. Para ser justa, tengo que decir que las personas que nos atendieron fueron amables y por el precio y la ubicación te tienes que amoldar, es Nueva York. Supongo que las habitaciones más caras de los pisos superiores estarán mejor, puede que en una de ellas sí que repetiría.

title: Great Customer Service
text: Great atmosphere, and the GM Scott was particularly helpful!  Would absolutely recommend and if you have any concerns, Scott is your guy!  Would highly recommend staying here if you're in the area.  Great location too.

title: Ok hotel
text: Nice room, spacious (for New York), comfortable large bed. Good location, very close to Empire State with some good restaurants down the street. Customer service not the best at times. Front desk let someone int our room without verifying their identity, luckily we were in the room at the time!!!

title: Ottimo alloggio
text: Posizione eccezionale per visitare Manhattan, personale cortese e camera pulita e silenziosa. Ottimo servizio di assistenza clienti: mi hanno stornato una prenotazione effettuata per errore nel giro di pochi giorni. Ci ritorneremo!

title: Horrific customer service
text: Around the 9th july, I booked this hotel for a trip that is happening next May. I noticed it was Free Cancellation, so obviously that suited me considering the booking was a while away. What I didn’t notice was the bit where they said they can take full payment at anytime before arrival date.Only when I was going through my online banking is when i notice my balance wasn’t what I’d thought. This hotel had taken full payment,£810, a full 10 months before my arrival!! Straight away I obviously cancel the booking, no hotel is holding my money that length of time! But that’s when the stress began. Was told it can take 30 business days for refund..I was more optimistic,and thought 10 days max..35 business days, 47 calendar days later, I get my refund,! And only after contacting booking.com, them sending a warning email. And guess what, my refund was light! Around £20 less than what I paid..so beware people, this behaviour could’ve emptied someone’s bank balance and left them with nothing for bills/food etc..

title: Good stay
text:
Nice place to stay. Modern and very clean. The staff is also friendly and helpfull.
They just need to do something about the shower. Shower is long but very narrow. The water goes all over the bathroom. Everything gets wet. They must know about this, because they add a drain to the centre of the bathrooms floor. Other than this, a very nice stay overall

title: Great location, small room
text: Overall, we had a good experience at this hotel. The location is great, located just a 15/20 min walk from Times Square. Staff were very friendly and accommodating. The room was clean with a large bed, however it was quite small. It was fine as we were only there for 2 nights, but if we were staying longer it may have become a bit claustrophobic. Enjoyed our stay overall.

title: Buono
text: Posizione centralissima. Comodo raggiungere tutto a piedi ma eventualmente c'è la metro proprio davanti. Pulizia insufficiente e non costante. Con l'aggiunta della colazione sarebbe ottimo. Personale gentile e disponibile.......

title: Good experience, great location!
text: Stayed here for a few days during the last week of July. The hotel is in a great location close to Times Square and Bryant park, which made it easier to get around. The room we stayed in was pretty basic as far as hotel rooms go, but the bed was clean and comfortable!!! I'd like to mention that looks can be deceiving for this hotel. The front desk location threw me off but once you get there you are greeted by friendly staff. It can be difficult to reach them on their phone number directly (I read some reviews that insisted this hotel is a scam/not real, I promise you that the hotel is very real), but if you leave a message they will return your call. They are very responsive with emails as well. Overall, it was a positive experience and I would book again in the future!

title: Accoglienza newyorkese
text:
Confortevole, pulito,dotato di ogni confort, silenzioso , personale molto cortese e disponibile. Cambi giornalieri di biancheria, bollitore  con cialde per caffè e bollitore,kit da toilette.
Palestra con solarium adiacente a saletta con forno microonde e dispenser di snack e bibite. Possibilità di prenotare aperitivi e brunch sull'adiacente terrazza con vista sull' Empire ( assolutamente da non perdere)
Zona centralissima,raggiungibile con metro in poco più di mezz'ora da JFK ( Airtrain + metro da Jamaica a Penna Station), strategica per trasporti, siti d' interesse e ristoranti. Da consigliare a chiunque desideri un hotel accogliente, con un buon rapporto qualità prezzo

title: Luces y sombras
text:
El hotel tiene una situación maravillosa. Está situado en una esquina de Midtown y nuestra habitación tenía unas bonitas vistas. 
La habitación en general está bien, el baño es pequeño  y la ducha sin manguera. El colchón de la cama auxiliar era un autentico horror. 
El acceso al llegar al hotel es muy negativo. Para empezar tienen la mala suerte que dejan la basura de delante (en NY no hay containers). La recepción está compartida con un roof bar y el acceso tiene aspecto de discoteca cutre, que debes superar para llegar a una recepción de hotel mínima, oscura y ajada, llena de paquetes y maletas y con aspecto muy dejado y sombrio. El mostrador de categoría de motel malo. El personal que atiende, en nuestro caso, solo con 3 contactos, con falta de orientación al cliente. Por poner dos ejemplo, veo ahora por las fotos que ofrecen un lobby , pero al llegar no te lo ofrecen. Ya me hubiera gustado saberlo, porque al llegar a la recepción, lo único que quieres es subir rápidamente a la habitación. Otro detalle, al hacer el check-out nos cobraron por guardar las maletas, después de casi 10 noches alli, no me había pasado nunca.
En conclusión, el hotel es un sí pero no.

title: Great hotel
text:
We were very pleased during our stay. You can’t beat the location, the room was spacious and clean with a direct view upon the Empire State Building. Subway station right in front of the hotel and a walking distance from Penn Station, Times Square, Grand Central etc. 
This hotel was a great value for its price and will definitely be going back for our next trip to NYC. 
Oh and also the staff at the reception were always very kind and polite :)

title: Dishonest
text: Awful. The room was ok but the price of the shuttle to JFK was higher than promised, and the driver suddenly could not speak English anymore, until we raised the amount. The worst hotel experience in US so far.

title: Not trust worthy
text: I just stayed at the hotel in Jul 2023, The hotel kep my deposits were they supposed to rerun. I kept sending email to them but they don’t response also it is impossible to reach out to them via any number. Very dissatisfied. I hope I get my $150 back.

title: Very poor
text: I booked a holiday for December 2023 and when I asked for my full refund back, the hotel kept 274.00 pounds back when they supposed to refund the whole amount. Also, they took long time to refund some money back. Don't trust them as I am at present disputing this transaction.

title: A wonderful surprise! A room with a view!
text:
The Herald 8 was a pleasant surprise. At first we couldn't find the hotel on the block. It is very unassuming. And there isn't really a lobby, just a small desk and an even smaller podium with a nice man that helps with the elevators. So first impressions are a bit worrisome. We didn't know what to expect. 

We had a king suite. There were three of us, and were assured there was room for three. We opened the door to a most spacious room! There was a pullout chair for sleeping. We had windows on each side. I don't know if we've ever had that. We had views of 6th avenue and Herald Square. The bathroom was pretty big too for NYC.  

There was an ice machine right near us, too. 

Sometimes only one elevator was working, but it didn't seem to be much of a problem. 

The maid service was great. Every day we had good service. 

The location was easy. A subway was right beside us. And we walked daily to Times Square to shows. 

The price was right. Comparing to everything else the week in July we went it was the best value- $220 a night. 

We would highly recommend this hotel. We are going back in November but it was too expensive then, sadly.

title: No very happy
text: Stayed at this until June 28th now in July  17th still unable to get the funds held as a deposit and no assistance at all from the hotel my bank is indicating there is still a hold no one even  answers the phone  at the hotel so money is tied up until I don't know when would not book this hotel in the future

title: A hidden gem
text:
And I mean that literally because one of the few problems with this hotel is that for some reason there is no sign outside with the name on it or any indication that it's a hotel. The lobby is just a small desk outside the elevators, but at least someone is always there and we got great help when we needed to store suitcases after check-out and order a taxi to JFK.

Other than that, I have only good things to say. The price was much better than others nearby, the location is perfect with walking distance to Penn Station and Times Square and also a subway station right outside the door to take you anywhere else in Manhattan. The room is fine, beds are decent, TV is pretty big, no complaints. No breakfast, but Taco Bell and other restaurants everywhere right outside the door.

title: Actually amazed at how basic this hotel is
text: Very basic room to the point where there is no phone to call down to reception. No hair dryer or iron available, never have I ever stayed somewhere without the basics. Small lamp in room has no plug to power up, it has a usb lead with nowhere to plug it in... Baffled! Under the beds are disgusting, don't think they've seen a hoover for ages. Only thing the hotel has got going for it is the location.

title: Welcoming and central location
text: Fabulous place to stay.  Staff are friendly and welcoming. Rooms comfortable,  clean and spacious.  Great value and location, easy access to subway but also close enough to walk to lots of key attractions. Our first trip to New York has been amazing

title: Solid Hotel
text:
In town for a concert.  Painless check-in.  Staff was polite, especially the maids and engineer.  For an NYC hotel, it was good sized.  All amenities worked well except the coffee maker.

Plenty of parking nearby.  I’d stay again if in the area.  Overall a solid hotel.

title: Hotel al centro di Manhattan
text: Sono stata a New York per una settimana, questo hotel l'ho scelto perche' si trova al centro. Avevo letto alcune recensioni negative, ma e' andato tutto benissimo. La camera era comoda e con vista.

title: Ottimo
text: Ho soggiornato per 5 giorni in questo hotel. Lo consiglio per la pulizia delle stanze, posizione strategica con metro posizionata all'uscita dell'albergo, vista mozzafiato dall'Empire posizionato fuori la finestra della camera, terrazza panoramica con vista stupenda, circondato da negozi. Lo consiglio

title: FALHA DE REEMBOLSO
text: Fiz reserva através de outra plataforma e solicitei cancelamento da mesma (opção cancelamento gratuito), o hotel me cobrou valor total da reserva no mesmo instante da compra e logo na sequencia pedi cancelamento da reserva e quase 30 dias e nada do valor (R$19500,00) reais ser estornado, sendo que a fatura já fechou e terei de pagar esse valor por algo que não vou utilizar, UM ABSURDO! HOTEL PESSIMO! ATENDIMENTO PESSIMO COM RESPOSTAS AUTOMATICAS! FUJAM DESSA PORCARIA, POIS CASO TENHAM ALGUM PROBLEMA ELE  NAO FORNECEM NENHUM TIPO DE SUPORTE AO CLIENTE!

title: Muito bom hotel !
text: Muito bom o hotel ! Possui uma cama confortável, frigobar, televisão, ferro de passar, banheiro limpo e novo. Perto de tudo. Uma estação de metrô bem na frente quase colado ao hotel. Oferecem transfer ao aeroporto ! Para o lá guardiã custou 65 dólares.

title: Aceptable
text: Estuvimos la última noche de nuestro viaje en este hotel, lo elegimos más que nada por su ubicación y precio que no resulta caro. Se ingresa por la entrada del rooftop Monarch, deberían poner algún cartel ya que no tienen lobby aún, se ve que lo están construyendo o no está habilitado. La habitación es básica, para ir a dormir, tiene minibar como lado positivo y hay pisos que tienen máquina de hielo. Le faltaba un poco de limpieza a la habitación, el baño sí bastante moderno parecía refaccionado. Para una noche cumplió sin pretenciones.

title: 5***** Brilliant Location Recommended for Large Familys
text:
We stayed here in May 2023 2 Rooms consisting of 2 Double Beds in each room, Decent Location and price was great, £1330 for 3 nights for 8 people. Only thing i could suggest is new pillows the ones we had were dated and to soft, 

Apart from that highly recommended and will def stay here again next time were in New York 

Wi-Fi Was included in the Price

title: Great hotel, would highly recommend!
text: We are just back from a 5 night stay at this hotel. It was the cheapest Midtown one I found when booking my trip to New York City on a budget. The location is excellent. The staff are friendly and very helpful. The room was clean and large and quiet. We had a corner room with great views. Rooms are cleaned and beds made every day. There are no resort fees or extra charges, just a €140 holding charge which you get back when you leave. There's a 24 hour McDonald's around the corner. We got iced coffees here in the mornings and walked up to Bryant Park with them. Overall, I have nothing bad to say about this hidden gem!! Thank you for your hospitality :)

title: Location and room was great
text: After reading the reviews I was hesitant to stay here. I'm so glad we did. Everything was great. I asked for an extra blanket, they brought it up in minutes. Everyday they gave us towels and anything else we needed. Our room was a corner so we had views of everything.  The only bad thing was we rented a king with a queen pull out. The pull out was more like a twin but we made due!! Our next trip we will definitely stay here. The location is close to everything!!!

title: Very good experience
text:
Was a great experience, room at 12th floor view towards Macy’s and 6th Avenue.
4th floor resting room with microwave was helpful for quick bites/breakfast.
Reception staff were extremely friendly and helpful!
Cannot recommend enough the hotel for a great location, value for money, very good experience.

title: Lisez mon commentaire avant de réserver
text: L’hôtel est bien situé, au cœur de Manhattan avec une sortie de métro (lignes jaune et orange) au pied de l’hôtel. Cette localisation fait que ça peut être bruyant parfois.
