If you don't want to walk, the subway stop is literally outside the hotel door.  We could see the Empire State Building and Macy's (where they have the parade) out our window.  The staff were extremely helpful and professional. Shout out to Michael, our doorman, bellman, concierge all in one!!! He welcomed us from the moment we got off the shuttle and every evening he checked in with us to see how we were doing - recommended places to eat and directions. It felt like we were coming "home" every evening.  The rooms were very clean and bed was super comfy. Thanks for the great memories and excellent stay!

title: Superbly central location
text: The hotel is perfectly situated across the road from Macys. Rooms are modern an spacious an staff were excellent. Michael the Doorman was exceptionally helpful for a number of diff tasks an made our stay extra special. I would highly reccommend.

title: Excellent - stayed here before, will stay again
text: I'm a Marriott Rewards Platinum so pretty much 'live' in Marriott Brands.  The Courtyard on Herald Square has a terrific location - subway access just outside the entrance, right across from Macys and very close to Penn Station.  The rooms are smallish - but you expect that in New York - but very well appointed.  Can get a fair amount of street noise if you have an outside room - but, again, this is New York and it didn't bother me at all.  Another writer noted slow elevators - maybe so, but I didn't notice. Love the walk in showers!  The staff is friendly and responsive.  I've stayed at this Courtyard for both business and pleasure trips to NY.   I'm very satisfied and I'll stay here again.

title: Perfect Location!
text: Wonderful and friendly staff. Prefect location for subways or walking to local attractions. Breakfast was the problem for the price. Microwave breakfast isn't the best choice to offer while charging $10+ for a single meal.  Regardless of that little detail I would definitely stay there again.  And Michael the doorman was beyond helpful! Give him a raise!

title: Great hotel and staff
text: Visited with my family in July. Angela in reservations was great and  gave us alot  of information about the area. We stayed in large executive king suite and we were pleasantly surprised with the size of the room and the amenities. Miguel at the front desk was great, and Michael in valet was very helpful.Hotel is centrally located, very clean, and new. We really enjoyed our stay and the staff made our visit very memorable!! Would certainly recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Buena ubicacion
text: Si vas a Nueva York este hotel es perfecto para ti, frente a Macys, Desigual, Victoria Secret y a una cuadra de muchas tiendas!!!!!!!!   Ademas hay sitios muy ricos para comer alrededor y esta a un paso de la estacion del metro.

title: Sehr gute Lage in Penn Station Nähe
text:
Das Hotel haben wir über booking.com gebucht und es liegt einen kurzen Fussweg von der Penn Station bzw. direkt an der 33rd Street und somit ideal, wenn man über Newark in die Stadt fahren will.
Durch eine Verspätung waren wir erst so gegen 22 Uhr im Hotel, wurden aber freundlich begrüßt und haben sogar ein Upgrade auf ein Zimmer im höchsten Stockwerk bekommen. Von der darüber befindlichen Lounge (zu der der Eingang direkt neben den Aufzügen zum Hotel liegt) hat man weniger gehört als von dem Strassenverkehr. Dieser war aber durchaus auszuhalten für eine so unglaublich zentrale Lage. 
Das Zimmer war sehr sauber und groß und lag am Ende des Gangs, wie schon gesagt in der obersten Etage (ich meine 17., bin mir da aber nicht mehr sicher!)
Der riesen Vorteil war die nächsten Tage die zentrale Lage mit diversen Subway-Linien direkt um die Ecke und Koreatown sowie diverse gute Steakhäuser und andere Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe.
Besonders zu erwähnen waren die netten Portiers, die immer hilfreich und nett waren.

title: Harika konumda bır otel...
text: Cok merkezı olmasına ragmen hıc gurultulu değil... Temizlik gayet yeterliydı...personel yardımcı... Ozellikle bellboylar... Her oda aynı konfora sahıp mi bilemem fakat bizim kaldıgımız oda yeterli genişlikteydi...kahvaltı seceneği sınırlı... Gec inerseniz daha da sınırlı.... Starbucks kahvaltı servisi yapıyor... Dort alternatıf sunuyor ve eger gec inerseniz alternatifler ikiye inebiliyor... Memnun kaldık... Tekrar kalmak isterim....

title: Excellent Staff
text: Great location.  I try to stay at here whenever I am in New York.  It is close to Macy's and would be perfect for the parade route.  The staff is great.  Michael the doorman went out of his way to arrange transportation for me to Newark Airport.  He is always friendly and full of knowledge about the area.  He is a great addtion to your staff.

title: Perfect New York Business trip.
text: I went to New York on a business trip and all our company group stayed on this hotel. Walking distance to our Company meeting. Excellent service. Very nice and clean rooms. Friendly staff. Computer station to print your boarding pass. Coffee shop and restaurant inside the lobby. Arrive one day earlier to our meeting and had tome to walk 5th Avenue to Central Park,. went to mass to St Patrick Cathedral, and add Dinner at Stella's inside Macy's Herald Square. The day after our meetings, we had a late flight so we had time to take the subway to 9/11 memorial. Hotel staff arrange a car service to take us to the Airport.

title: Great little hotel
text: Good little hotel with small but clean and well appointed rooms in a good location to explore the city. Was a little pricey but it's New York! The hotel doesn't have much in the way of facilities, but you can find all you need near the hotel.

title: Отличное место!
text: Останавливался там на пару дней чтобы еще раз побывать в своем любимом городе! Прекрасное расположение, профессиональный и чуткий персонал! Шаговая доступность до большинства крутых мест! Для тех, кому важен шопинг - напротив Macy`s!)

title: Great stay, excellent location!
text: As others have stated, the location is what makes this hotel a perfect stay.  Located on the corner of the Avenue of the Americas and W 35th Street, with subway access right outside to multiple lines and only a 5 minute walk to Bryant Park.  Brought my family to New York for their first visit and couldn't have been more pleased with hotel and staff.  My wife and I also went up to the rooftop bar, which has fantastic views and as expected pricey drinks, but for the view was worth a few drinks.  Would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting NYC.

title: Perfekt für den New York Besuch
text: Absolut zentrale Lage fast direkt neben dem Empire State Building. Idealer Ausgangspunkt für alle Touren. Metro direkt vor der Tür. Hotel neu renoviert, sehr schöne Zimmer, Preis-Leistungsverhältnis ok. Wir würden wieder hier buchen. Empfehlung: Frühstücken um die Ecke bei Pret a Manger, billiger und besser. Abendessen bei Jimmys Grill oder Stellan Bar alles mx. 200 m.

title: A little gem in fantastic location
text: Stayed here in mid July for 4 nights. We had a lovely room.  Good size with a king size bed and a large sofa bed for our teenage son. Our room had a great view & a very nice bathroom. The doormen were super helpful and we got a very reasonably priced private hotel car to JFK. The location could not be better. A little gem - will definitely stay here again.

title: Excelente hotel y el mejor servicio
text: Estuvimos 8 noches con mi familia. La ubicación es inmejorable. El edificio está perfecto. El servicio y la limpieza son muy buenas. Lo mejor es el personal y la predisposición y humor con la que trabajan. Tratan de solucionar tus problemas.

title: Larger rooms, but still inexpensive
text:
To begin with, I was surprised how large the rooms were.  In some New York hotels, there is barely enough room to fit the bed.  In this case, there was more than enough room for the king size bed (x2) and the size of the bathroom was comfortably large.

While it was still utilitarian, it was very comfortable and not claustrophobic.

One note of warning:  We were on the top floor and it was a weekend.  The bar on the roof played rather loud music.  You could clearly hear it while waiting for the 17th floor elevator.  However, it was really hard to hear in the rooms (the soundproofing was amazing).  If you are a light sleeper, you might want to go one more floor down if you're planning to stay on a weekend.

title: Another Great Stay
text: This was our third time here in the past two years and had another great stay. Although this time we were not able to check in early as the room wasn't ready, Miguel was as personable, friendly and efficient as we've ever seen. Room was fantastic again with two double beds. Quiet enviornment. Free wifi. Starbucks located on the lobby floor. Taxi's readily available parked and lined up just outside on the street due to this and other hotels on the same block. Great location for walking to times square which we did for the theatre. Subway entrance is right outside the hotel for numerous lines which was very convenient and all others are within a block or two. Only item to note is that the disco/rooftop bar is on the 17th floor, I would have reservations of staying on the 16th floor just in case due to the late night crowd. We have made this our go to hotel now in midtown.

title: Best Location
text:
Good experience. The best thing is the location.
All main attractions in New York are easily reachable from here.
Also rooms are good and clean.
Staff was friendly.
Overall very good experience. Will recommend to anyone

title: posizione ottima, un po caro
text: La posizione è veramente ottima, zona tranquilla si può girare senza pensieri anche la sera. Le camere non sono nemmeno così piccole come accade di solito a NYC. Certo è un po' caro, però siamo veramente a due passi dall'empire.

title: Incredible service, updated hotel and great location
text:
This was probably the best experience I have every had at a Courtyard. This one is modern and updated. The staff at checkin were very friendly, and my room was ready at noon! The room was a bit small, but this is common for NYC. 

I had a king room and it had an amazing view of the empire state building! The room was quiet overnight and they have a great breakfast area with a coffee bar that served pastries and hot breakfast. (Not free, but good prices). 

The hotel was not crowded, like some large NY hotels. This made it even better!

The hotel also has a lounge at the top, that is an open rooftop bar with an upscale feel and amazing views. I recommend making a reservation though. Michael, the bellman, was very helpful in getting me a car setup for the airport, and gave me a great restaurant recommendation. Thanks again Mike! 

The hotel is also very close to times square, maybe a 10 minute walk. Across from macys as well. Good area, lots of restaurants and things to do. 

I would absolutely stay here again!

title: Great stay
text: The room was modern and tastefully decorated, and the hotel and the room were clean. Good service at check-in. Location central and convenient and very close to a subway station. Pleasant staff. Would definitely stay again.

title: Ótima escolha em Manhattan
text: O hotel é super bem localizado, com uma estação de metro a poucos passos e a curta distância de vários pontos turísticos e de compras. Os quartos são muito confortáveis, limpos e com um excelente isolamento acústico. A máquina de café e o frigobar foram muito úteis. O bar/restaurante no pátios é uma ótima opção para drinks no início da noite. Em resumo, é uma excelente relação custo-benefício.

title: Posizione strategica. Molto caro per cio' che da'
text: Non saro' breve. Quest'hotel, per i prezzi che richiede dovrebbe essere cancellato dalle liste. Sembra che il management abbia improntato tutto al risparmio ed al limite dell'accettabile. Il WIFI, tanto declamato ,nelle camere funziona a sprazzi. Le stanze sono piccole: una stanza con due letti semi matrimoniali, per tre persone : un armadio striminzito con tre piccoli cassetti per la biancheria e uno spazio destinar ad un asse da stiro con il relativo ferro da stiro: si' avete capito bene. L'hotel, della decantata catena Marriott dispone di una lavanderia e asciugatrice a gettoni al quarto piano ( il detersivo lo si dovrebbe comprare nella lobby ): siamo nel 2014 o nel 1950? Nei dintorni ci sono molte lavanderie cinesi a buon prezzo, non sarebbe meglio offrire un servizio alla clientela ? Dopo aver ripetuto quattro volte che essendo in tre persone, quando terminava un flacone di shampoo in bagno era necessario rimpiazzarlo, sono siamo riusciti ad ottenere il dovuto (e' la prima volta in assoluto che mi capita di trovare un hotel, di un certo tono, dove lesinano le dotazioni del bagno). Il bagno e' rigorosamente sprovvisto di bidet, e' piccolo e la doccia, nella mia camera, e' inclusa nella vasca da bagno ed fissa al muro. Devo dire che la pulizia delle stanze e' ottima. Cio' che salva questo hotel e' la posizione strategica per chi vuole girare New York, ma a questi prezzi non credo non si trovi in giro di meglio. Il personale parla solo rigorosamente american english, e' sicuramente disponibile ( nei limiti complessivi dell'hotel)

title: I'll be back
text: This hotel is convenient to so many things to do. Just wish I had more time, in town on business and stayed here one night. Close to Penn Station, MSG, Macys, Empire State Building, on and on. Subway stop 1/2 block away. Michael is a great help, get to know him. I'll be back.
